name: wekan
description: Wekan is an open-source, Trello-like kanban board for managing tasks and projects. It offers boards, lists, cards, swimlanes, and permissions, and can be deployed self-hosted or via various hosted providers for teams of any size.

features.title: Kanban Boards
features.description: Organize tasks visually with customizable boards, lists, and cards for project management

features.title: Drag
features.description: Move cards between lists effortlessly to update task status and workflow progression

features.title: Card Details
features.description: Add descriptions, checklists, due dates, attachments, and comments to cards for comprehensive task tracking

features.title: Swimlanes
features.description: Group cards horizontally by assignee, priority, or custom criteria for better organization

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize cards with color-coded labels for quick visual identification of task types

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign cards to team members, mention users in comments, and track who's working on what

features.title: Board Templates
features.description: Create reusable board templates for recurring projects or standardized workflows

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Visualize tasks with due dates in a calendar format for deadline management
